description: The Purple Poppy Mallow is a beautiful flowering plant whose blooms will make heads turn. It features deeply lobed and divided foliage that grows in gorgeous shades of deep purple, giving it an exotic look. Its clusters of delicate blooms are bright lavender or magenta, adding cheerful color and life to any garden. The Purple Poppy Mallow is drought tolerant, making it versatile and suitable for xeriscaping. Its blooms cycle throughout the year, accenting its foliage with pops of vibrant color, and its long lasting blooms will delight long after their brilliant blooms have faded.
